void write (BinaryOStream &os) const
 * NOTE * Any time you change the serialised format of this class, you must also update LoggerComponentMessage in bigworld/tools/server/pycommon/messages.py to match, otherwise server tools will not be able to talk to the logger.

Detailed Description

The message that is sent to MessageLogger to register with it.

Member Function Documentation

void LoggerComponentMessage::read ( BinaryIStream &  is  ) 

void LoggerComponentMessage::write ( BinaryOStream &  os  )  const

* NOTE * Any time you change the serialised format of this class, you must also update LoggerComponentMessage in bigworld/tools/server/pycommon/messages.py to match, otherwise server tools will not be able to talk to the logger.
